SASKATCHEWAN ARCHIVES QUESTIONNAIRES

No. 2

PIONEER EXPERIENCES: A GENERAL QUESTIONNAIRE

NOTE: Please print all proper names and place names in capital letters. If you are not sure the name is correct as you have given it, please say so. It is quite acceptable to have someone else do the writing at your dictation.

1. Your full name .................................................... Mrs. Selina Schroeder
2. Your address ........................................................... Chivin, Lot 6
3. Date ................................................................. March 28
4. Where were you born? (Give name of place and country) .............................................. Stephen Township
5. What was your father's name and occupation? ............................................................. Farmer Frank Schroeder
6. When did you come to Saskatchewan? (Give month and Year) ........................................ 1912
7. Mention any other places where you lived before coming to Saskatchewan, giving dates wherever possible.

8. How old were you when you first came to Western Canada? (You do not need to answer this question if you would rather not or you may use "I was a small child", "I was in my teens", etc.) ........................................ 70
9. What were your reasons for coming West? ................................................................. He came it was a call, Brandy
10. How did you learn about the West? (Through other people? Reading about it? Railroad or government information?) .......................................................... Through relations

11. How did you earn a living before coming to Stephen Township? ........................................ Farming, Poveshell
